name: Add or update records in Airtable from newly created, updated or cancelled events in Calendly
description:
Every time a new Calendly event is scheduled with you, a new record will be instantly created in Airtable. If the event is canceled, the Airtable record will be updated. A Slack notification will be sent. 

You need to have a Calendly premium account to create this integration.

The template expects your Airtable table to have the following columns:
1) Event URL
2) Status
3) Attendee Name
4) Attendee Email
